text: Hey Christian, I looked at this when you sent it over and then completely forgot about it has had some crazy stuff happening in the last week on some freelance work

It looked really cool. Obviously you're still working on it, it would be interesting to hear what you're planning on doing to it as currently it doesn't integrate too well. The comp side of it looked pretty good, I think you could match your black levels a little bit closer. It would be a good idea to render some utility passes like depth and motion vectors so you can add motion blur and match the defocus to the plate as you can see his sleeve is slightly defocused and if he lifts his hand I imagine that'll be out of focus. In the 3D side I think you need to put his sleeve in when lighting so A) you get some bounce light off his white t shirt, might be best to stick a generic body in for this and B) you get some shadows/light blocker from his body/shoulder
